column6: Magneto's return has stunned the X-Men, but that's not the only surprise they're in for as a herd of Predator X's come hungry for mutant tar tar.  The hits just keep on coming, but can the X-Men, still nursing their wounds from UTOPIA, deal with all this? Rated T  ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | writer:Matt Fraction | penciller:Greg Land | colorist:Justin Ponsor
